trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around February 9th 2009
divs: sighting detailsso i'm not too sure what to expect from this but here goes. i'll preceed this by saying that i had an experience which originally seemed to strictly be a really cool dream that startled me. i thought this until about 15 minutes ago when i noticed a common factor that is shared with a few other stories told by others on this site. i recall having been extremely tired on this evening and going to bed around 9 pm. i was asleep on my left side with my right arm over my girlfriend as we lay in the "spooning" position. i know this as fact because i was in this exact same position in my bed, in my apartment, with the same exact surroundings in my dream. i recall seeing an alien being standing at the foot of my bed. it was about 5-1\2 to 6 feet tall. you know, big eyes, grey, all the characteristics that pop culture has taught me to be characteristics of an alien. the one thing that was different is the one thing that i now find odd. it was wearing what appeared to be a 3 piece suit. black. i find this odd because i had never heard of sightings\encounters having beings wearing suits. at the time i jsut thought it was some crazy detail my mind made up. anyway, this thing reached out as if to grab me from the foot of the bed and it scared the living you-know-what out of me and woke me up yelling. i've never woken up yelling about a dream before. i truley to enjoy scary dreams, when i get them which is rare, and never wake up yelling. my girlfirend woke up to my scream and calmed me down. now from the time i had gone to sleep until this moment when i am now calmed down, it seemed as though i had been asleep for 15-20 minutes max. when i looked at the clock it was some time around 1 am. i do not recall having a dream about aliens prior to, or after this. some of you reading this are probably thinking this is absolutely nothing, and that may be the case as these are all the details. but, the part that just put a big lump in my throat is that it was wearing a 3 piece suit. like i said, i've never heard any story about an alien wearing a suit. and if i was dreaming, why, if i've never heard of this, would this thing be wearing a suit. i found this site about a week ago and am completely enamoured with it. now having read others encounters on this site, it's making me wonder since a few of them report seing beings wearing suits. i may have left out a detail or two because i tried to submit the form previously but didn't fill it out all the way and had to type all of this over again. if you know of a similar experience and can shed some light on this, please do let me know.
